sections.title: Shadowdancer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Shadowdancer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Shadowdancers are proficient with specific light weapons and ranged weapons, plus light armor but no shields.

sections.title: Hide in Plain Sight (Su) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Allows use of Stealth skill while being observed, as long as within 10 feet of dim light, but cannot hide in own shadow.

sections.title: Evasion (Ex) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Takes no damage on successful Reflex saves against effects that normally deal half damage, only while wearing light or no armor.

sections.title: Darkvision (Ex) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Grants darkvision 60 feet, or increases existing darkvision range by 30 feet.

sections.title: Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Cannot be caught flat-footed even against invisible attackers, but can still lose Dex bonus if immobilized or feinted.

sections.title: Rogue Talent (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Gains rogue talents every three levels starting at 3rd, can select advanced talents if already possessing that class feature.

sections.title: Shadow Illusion **(Sp)** (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Creates visual illusions as silent image spell, usable once per day per two shadowdancer levels with Charisma-based DC.
keywords: once per day per two levels

sections.title: Summon Shadow (Su) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Summons an undead shadow companion with matching alignment that cannot create spawn, with special bonuses and penalties for dismissal.

sections.title: Shadow Call (Sp) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Creates creatures and effects from shadow as shadow conjuration, upgrading to greater shadow conjuration at 10th level.

sections.title: Shadow Jump (Su) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Teleports between areas of dim light like dimension door, with daily distance limits that double every two levels.

sections.title: Defensive Roll (Ex) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Once per day can attempt to avoid a lethal blow, functioning as the rogue advanced talent of the same name.

sections.title: Improved Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Cannot be flanked, preventing sneak attacks unless the attacker has four more rogue levels than shadowdancer levels.

sections.title: Slippery Mind (Ex) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Becomes resilient to enchantment spells, functioning as the rogue advanced talent of the same name.

sections.title: Shadow Power (Sp) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Uses raw shadow to damage foes as shadow evocation spell, usable once per day at 8th level and twice at 10th.

sections.title: Improved Evasion (Ex) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: Takes no damage on successful Reflex saves and half damage on failed saves against effects allowing Reflex saves for half damage.

sections.title: Shadow Master (Su) (Shadowdancer)
sections.description: While in dim light, gains DR 10/— and +2 luck bonus on saves, plus blinds critically hit foes in dim light for 1d6 rounds.
